message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your operations and bring significant value to your business. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $2000000 for this exceptional product.
I appreciate the value you're offering, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
